Mostly clear PERIOD Low near 35F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



The Purdue wrestling team will take to the South End Zone of RossAde Stadium for Practice on the Patio starting at  a.m PERIOD ET on Saturday PERIOD The 90minute practice precedes the Boilermakers Homecoming football game against Iowa that is set to kick at noon PERIOD

We are very excited to be able to take our practice outside to the South End Zone and expose our sport Purdue head wrestling coach Tony Ersland said PERIOD Its going to be exciting to put our guys in a different environment and show casual fans or even those that havent been exposed to wrestling how hard our guys work PERIOD Its going to be a great experience for everyone. spectators will have the opportunity to see the nations No PERIOD  recruiting class returning NCAA qualifier Alex Griffin and new assistant coach Kendric Maple a NCAA champion at  pounds and volunteer assistant coach Jake Sueflohn a fourtime NCAA qualifier all in action PERIOD The  Purdue wrestling poster will be revealed and available to fans at Practice on the Patio PERIOD

A ticket for the football game is required for entry and full South End Zone concession options will be available during Practice on the Patio PERIOD
